title: 'Fresh Air' Remembers Johnny Gimble, The 'King Of The Swing Fiddle'
teaser: Gimble, who died Saturday at the age of 88, spent years playing fiddle with the Texas Playboys. He was regarded by critics as one of the best to ever pick up a bow. Originally broadcast April 9, 2010.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
